title: BRIEF-Taiwan's Innolux orders machinery equipment from Ulvac, Applied Materials
text:
BRIEF-Taiwan's Innolux orders machinery equipment from Ulvac, Applied Materials 
Oct 14 Innolux Corp 
* Says orders machinery equipment for T$1.5 billion ($46.17 million) 
Source text for Eikon:
